R

REQUEST_AUDIO_RECORDING_PERMISSION - Static variable in class net.ralphpina.permissionsmanager.PermissionsManager
Request code to use in your Activity.onRequestPermissionsResult(int, String[], int[]) or Fragment.onRequestPermissionsResult(int, String[], int[]) to check audio recording permission was granted.
